DON'T MISS OUT!
LAST FEW PLACES FOR NCS FEB 2015
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Don’t miss your once in a lifetime opportunity with NCS this February half term. We have a few places left in your area for the NCS programme which is running between 14 and 20 February - if you sign up before 8 Feb we’ll enter you into a prize draw to win a Minirig portable speaker system!
Sign up here: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
Want to know more about NCS? – Don’t just take our word for it - Here’s a short film which describes it by people who have already taken part.
WORRIED ABOUT MOCKS?
If you're worried about fitting NCS in over half term with mocks, course work and everything else - don’t be! We know about these and have designed our programme so you have free time and a break before the end of half term.
There’s lots more information on our website or if you're ready, you can sign up here: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
If you’re interested in what other people have said about NCS, you can find us on Facebook and Twitter.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
